item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

ok i changed the case to this

case 2875:

	  if(playerLevel[1] < 40) {
sendMessage("You are now training Defence and Hitpoints (3.5 seconds between clicks please).");

setAnimation(1978);

addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[3]), 3);

addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[1]), 1);

updateRequired = true; 

appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

} else {
	sendMessage("You are too high for this!!!");
break;

and now i have 44errors, after adding the

else {
	sendMessage("You are too high for this!!!");
